<<<<<<< HEAD
A description of the venereal disease declaring the causes, signs, effects, and cure thereof. With a discourse of the most wonderful antivenereal pill. Prepared onely by Charles Peter, chyrurgeon, and practitioner in physick. And are to be sold at his House in St. Martins-lane, near Long-acre, over against the sign of the Castle. Peter, Charles.
16 p.
printed for the author, London : 1678.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
